Description: Lower wall sherd of North Ionian black-figured pottery bowl; interior glazed with added red band; exterior, cream slip: most of rear of a feline to left; added red and incised details; rosette and blobs as fill; below, band and top of probable maeander frieze.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.197)
